verbose_text: In the Tg2576 animal model for AD amyloidosis, activation of the peroxisome proliferator activated receptor-gamma (PPARgamma) with rosiglitazone (RSG) ameliorates hippocampus dependent cognitive impairment and restores aberrant synaptic activity at the entorhinal cortex to DG granule neuron inputs.
evidence: PPARgamma) with rosiglitazone (RSG) ameliorates hippocampus-dependent cognitive impairment and restores aberrant synaptic activity at the entorhinal cortex to DG
